metdetection.parsing

Interface EventParser

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KernEventParser, MidiEventParser

    public interface EventParser
    An EventParser handles the interfacing between this program and music files. It reads note-events from a file with run().

    One EventParser is required per song you wish to parse.

    Author:
    Andrew McLeod - 23 October, 2014

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<java.util.List<MidiNote>> getGoldStandardVoices()
      Get a List of the gold standard voices from this song.
      void run()
      Parses the events from the loaded music file.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        void run()
         throws javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException,
                java.io.IOException
        Parses the events from the loaded music file.
        Throws:
        javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException - If a note off event doesn't match any previously seen note on.
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurred while reading the file.

      • getGoldStandardVoices

        java.util.List<java.util.List<MidiNote>> getGoldStandardVoices()
        Get a List of the gold standard voices from this song.
        Returns:
        A List of the gold standard voices from this song.
